root.sql: SELECT c.id, c.terminalid, t.deviceid, t.terminalno, t.simno, t.protocoltype, t.versioncode FROM bs_vehicle c INNER JOIN bs_terminal t ON t. id = c. terminalid
SELECT s.code, s.description, s.modelcode, t.xml FROM bs_functionset t INNER JOIN bs_gpssoftversion s ON s.code = t.code
SELECT t.vehicleid, t.unitid, t.status FROM bs_warehouseoutin t WHERE t.id IN (SELECT MAX(id) FROM bs_warehouseoutin GROUP BY vehicleid)

SELECT t.id, t.fencesharp, t.fencegeoinfo, v.vehicleid FROM bs_orgunit t INNER JOIN bs_vehicleorgunitrelation v ON t.id = v.orgunitid WHERE t.orgunittypeid = 3 AND t.fencesharp IN (1, 2) AND t.fencegeoinfo IS NOT NULL
